title: Brechin 0-1 Albion: Match Report
text: Brechin 0-1 Albion: Match Report 24 Oct 2015 17:01:00 Joshua Mullin's goal for Albion condemns Brechin to another defeatBrechin's dreadful run continued with a 1-0 defeat to Albion, their fifth home loss in six.Both player-managers opted to sit out the fixture, and Darren Young was happier than counter-part Darren Dods at the end as his side put in a competent away performance. The sides traded early efforts on goal in an even opening quarter. The visitors got their noses in front midway through the half. Joshua Mullin swung in a cross and Paul Willis nodded cleverly past Graeme Smith.In the second period, Mullin threatened to extend the lead, while Willie Dyer had a couple of dangerous efforts for Brechin.The win took Albion up to third, as Brechin remained bottom.
